tool_description: Creates a comprehensive profile of a child including age, developmental milestones, interests, learning preferences, and any special considerations for activity planning.

child_age_months.description: Child's age in months (6-216 months, i.e., 6 months to 18 years)

learning_style.description: Preferred learning style: visual, auditory, kinesthetic, or mixed

special_needs.description: Any special considerations or accommodations needed

error_messages: Invalid age range: child_age_months must be between 6 and 216 months.
Empty interests array: At least one interest must be provided.
Invalid learning style: Must be one of [visual, auditory, kinesthetic, mixed].
Invalid attention span: attention_span_minutes must be between 1 and 120 minutes.
usage: Provide the child's age in months and their interests. Optionally specify learning style, special needs, and typical attention span to create a comprehensive profile for activity matching.

profile_id.description: Unique identifier for this child profile

recommended_activity_duration.description: Suggested activity duration in minutes based on age and attention span

profile_summary.description: Brief summary of the child's profile and learning characteristics
